hero.title: Hi! I'm Nyuysemo Carlglain Nyuykividzem
hero.subtitle: Software Engineer & Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: I am a passionate software engineer specializing in web and mobile development. Currently interning at Nkwa, a fintech company in Buea, Cameroon. I love creating innovative solutions that solve real-world problems and enhance user experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.description: I'm a dedicated software engineer with a passion for technology and innovation. Currently pursuing my education while gaining hands-on experience through my internship at Nkwa, where I'm contributing to fintech solutions that make a difference in people's lives.
about.internship_description: Working on innovative fintech solutions, developing web and mobile applications, and contributing to the company's digital transformation initiatives.

services.title: Services I Offer
services.subtitle: What I can do for you

web_development.title: Web Development
web_development.description: Creating responsive, modern web applications using the latest technologies and best practices.

mobile_development.title: Mobile Development
mobile_development.description: Building native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android.

ui_ux_design.title: UI/UX Design
ui_ux_design.description: Designing intuitive and beautiful user interfaces that enhance user experience.

api_development.title: API Development
api_development.description: Building robust and scalable RESTful APIs and microservices.

database_design.title: Database Design
database_design.description: Designing and optimizing database schemas for optimal performance.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: Providing expert advice on technology choices and architecture decisions.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together
contact.name: Name
contact.availability_text: I'm currently available for freelance work and full-time opportunities. I'm particularly interested in full-stack development projects, mobile app development, technical consulting, and open source contributions.

footer.description: A passionate software engineer dedicated to creating innovative solutions that make a difference in people's lives through technology.
